sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Dutch: De oorlogskreet voor gerechtigheid was overal - veel voor het verdriet van de autoriteiten.
backtrans: The war child for justice was everywhere - much for the sadness of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Dutch: De beslissing van het regime beschrijft de onderliggende agenda.
backtrans: The decision of the regime describes the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Dutch: De gemeenschap was bezorgd over het passeren van de broodnodige hervormingen.
backtrans: The community was concerned about passing the much needed reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Dutch: De Think Tank publiceerde een paper waarin hun verontschuldiging van de doodstraf schetst.
backtrans: The Think Tank published a paper in which their apology sketches out of death.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
Dutch: Was een geldigheid van de petitie
backtrans: Was a validity of the petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Dutch: De president sportte zijn ministers aan om te zakken als belangrijke oppositieondersteuning voor zijn economische plan stond op het punt om te gesp.
backtrans: The president sports his ministers to pock up as an important opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Dutch: De kiezers werden gechufferd om te zien dat de rekening is geslaagd.
backtrans: The voters were menched to see that the bill has succeeded.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Dutch: De discursieve vertelling van de advocaat zwaaide de jury.
backtrans: The discursive story of the lawyer waved the jury.

Dutch: Het Hof heeft het geweld ingeleverd!
backtrans: The court has returned the violence!

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Dutch: Het EU-blok verzet zich tegen een eventuele instelling van antidumpingmaatregelen.
backtrans: The EU block opposes a possible institution of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Dutch: Een fulsome eulogy werd geleverd door de sluwe raad.
backtrans: A Fulsome Eulogy was supplied by the cunning council.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Dutch: Het bureau van de Gig-Economy heeft besloten de restituties te garneren!
backtrans: The Bureau of the Gig Economy has decided to garnish the refunds!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Dutch: Leden van de anti-theocratische revolutionaire beweging omverbreiden de leeftijdsgenoten in de macht!
backtrans: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement revolve the peers in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Dutch: De verraders besloten om te vechten met de kolonialisten.
backtrans: The traitors decided to fight with the colonialists.
